name: Connect My Story
overview:
ConnectMyStory ask people to tell a short real story from their life. It could be something that already happened, is happening, or will happen shortly. Then they connect real stories of different people who donâ€™t know each other to find relations.

How it works?

  1. You simply post your story on our website and within seconds, we will search our database for stories that share keywords with yours. Search results will simply show the most related stories first, then the less related ones.

  2. While you read some stories, you can click on â€œConnectâ€ to connect several stories to yours in order to generate a â€œSocial Mapâ€ for your story by which you can identify people involved in those connections.

  3. Then you can socialize with them via Facebook , follow them on Twitter, read their blogs, or even meet with them.
